item.title: Y2K Final Sprint: September 1999
item.description: 94 Days to Midnight September 28, 1999. Just 94 days until January 1, 2000. The reality of Y2K was no longer abstractâ€”it was imminent. In the NTU labs, we had shifted from “let’s fix this” to “we must fix this NOW.” The atmosphere was urgent but focused. The Final Push By September, we were debugging solutions at a frantic pace. Every day brought discoveries of systems we hadn’t yet examined. Banks were reaching out.
